Title: Blue Water
Plot: Sam and James depart the island in a daring rescue attempt. Back on the island of Sainte Marina, a Chinese diplomat arrives to make a deal with Marcus. With scarcity and a prison problem plaguing him, Marcus finds himself treading down a more treacherous path than he could have imagined.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jason Beghe, Chin Han, David Rees Snell, Will Rothhaar
